Tucson Prime knew he had to stick up for Perceptor, and he lifts his head u=
p to Cheetor, Ramulus and Airhammer with a passive yet stoic expression on =
his face, as would Optimus Prime when passing a message of importance to hi=
s Comrades.

" Cheetor, Ramulus, Airhammer, I understand your distrust for =
the opposite faction but as Legacy has exclaimed, Perceptor has more than s=
hown us his loyalty to our faction and if it were not for him, none of us w=
ould be getting out of here safely. Not even myself.  So, I ask all of you =
to show him the respect, you would show your leader, Lord Elder, and Primes=
 who have governed before me.  Let this be known that it is not a request, =
but as a Prime, I am telling you to respect those who have shown the capabi=
lity of turning over a new leaf."

Quickstride nodds.

" He's telln' the tr=
uth guys, Perceptor's legit."

Straight Shot also gives them a thumbs up.

=
"And if I didn't give a thumbs up then you'd know it's not true."

Tucson P=
rime waits for everyone to get out safely before making moves to get himsel=
f out of the deep hole. He assists on holding the cable so is to make it ea=
sier for the others to climb out.  It was what Optimus Prime would have don=
e, before helping himself out of a tight jam.

" All right, I don't wish to=
 overload anyone, so I will wait until everyone else is out safely, before =
I get out of here myself.  I want to make sure that no one is left behind."=
